text_block_list.text: Soon, a big event to determine the abilities of horse girls would be underway, the day of the Selection Race was coming.
In preparation for that race, I'm heading to the training course

text_block_list.name: King Halo
text_block_list.text: Haven't I told you already!!

text_block_list.name: King Halo
text_block_list.text: I do have the talent! I'll absolutely show my abilities in this Selection Race and get myself a first-class trainer!

text_block_list.name: King Halo
text_block_list.text: I have no intention of discussing this any further! Goodbye!

text_block_list.name: King Halo
text_block_list.text: Ha… Good grief. A phone call at a time like this—

text_block_list.name: King Halo
text_block_list.text: EH, AAAH!? W-WHO ARE YOU?! DON'T TELL ME A SUSPICIOUS PERSON?!
I explained I was a new trainer to clear up the misunderstanding.

text_block_list.name: King Halo
text_block_list.text: My, was that so, excuse me. But, it's rare to see King make a mistake like that so let's call it even!

text_block_list.name: King Halo
text_block_list.text: …Hey, what's with that confused expression. …Don’t tell me, you don’t actually appreciate this!?

text_block_list.name: King Halo
text_block_list.text: Well then you… How dare you not know of me!?

text_block_list.name: King Halo
text_block_list.text: How horrible!! You're making me want to cry! Come with me night this instant!!
…Dragged almost forcibly, I was made to follow her to central square.

text_block_list.name: King Halo
text_block_list.text: Alright, assemble!!

text_block_list.name: Followers
text_block_list.text: Yes～!

text_block_list.name: Cat-eyed Horsegirl
text_block_list.text: What’s up King, did something happen?

text_block_list.name: Bob-cut Horsegirl
text_block_list.text: Who’s this person～?

text_block_list.name: King Halo
text_block_list.text: A rookie trainer. But it seems like he doesn’t know anything about King. Don't you think that's just horrible?

text_block_list.name: King Halo
text_block_list.text: Sc can I ask you two for the usual?

text_block_list.name: Followers
text_block_list.text: Roger～!!

text_block_list.name: King Halo
text_block_list.text: Ufufu, good answer! Well then, here we go!

text_block_list.name: King Halo
text_block_list.text: My name is?

text_block_list.name: Followers
text_block_list.text: King!!

text_block_list.name: King Halo
text_block_list.text: Stronger than anyone else?

text_block_list.name: Cat-eyed Horsegirl
text_block_list.text: The victor!

text_block_list.name: King Halo
text_block_list.text: And her future is?

text_block_list.name: Bob-cut Horsegirl
text_block_list.text: Shining brightly! A horse girl looked up to more than anyone else!

text_block_list.name: King Halo
text_block_list.text: That's right! When you think "first-class horse girl" you think of me!

text_block_list.name: King Halo-ers
text_block_list.text: King Halo!!

text_block_list.name: King Halo
text_block_list.text: …Hey you, stop staring into space! Where's the applause, huh!? The applause!

text_block_list.name: King Halo
text_block_list.text: The great King went out of her way to introduce herself just for you! Applaud while weeping in tears!

text_block_list.name: King Halo
text_block_list.text: Yes, that's right. I conveyed it well didn't I? That the elegant, noble, and pretty King is the very meaning of first-class horse girl.

text_block_list.name: King Halo
text_block_list.text: Now you along with the rest of the school, understand the splendor of King's glory, intellect, and expectations don't you?

text_block_list.name: King Halo
text_block_list.text: Why!? I gave you a very easy to understand explanation didn't I!? You dimwit!

text_block_list.name: King Halo
text_block_list.text: Good grief… since it's come to this, one more time! Now, you two! Get ready!

text_block_list.name: Cat-eyed Horsegirl
text_block_list.text: But King, is it okay for you to still be here?

text_block_list.name: Cat-eyed Horsegirl
text_block_list.text: Didn't you say you were gonna enter the Selection Race and train with everyone today?

text_block_list.name: King Halo
text_block_list.text: …Ah.
At the training course, competing horse girls and trainers that came to spectate the race had already arrived.

text_block_list.name: King Halo
text_block_list.text: Ha… Ha… Ohohoho! King has come to train! Kept you waiting didn't I! Ohoho… goho.

text_block_list.name: Seiun Sky
text_block_list.text: Oh geez, King, did you run here at full speed cause you thought you'd be late～? Don't push yourself, how about you rest a bit.

text_block_list.name: King Halo
text_block_list.text: Th-there's no need for such a thing!! Besides, look around. There's so many trainers that have come to see King's abilities!

text_block_list.name: King Halo
text_block_list.text: I can't waste time resting! Ohhohoho!!

text_block_list.name: Seiun Sky
text_block_list.text: Wa… in many ways, this was expected～.

text_block_list.name: Special Week
text_block_list.text: Ah, you came too huh, King-chan? I was just about to start using the course but do you wanna run together?

text_block_list.name: King Halo
text_block_list.text: Of course! You come too Sky-san, I'll give you the privilege of being overwhelmed by me!

text_block_list.name: Seiun Sky
text_block_list.text: Okay, I've got first!

text_block_list.name: King Halo
text_block_list.text: Ah!? Hey, don't run away!

text_block_list.name: Special Week
text_block_list.text: Eh, we started already!? Wait up～!

text_block_list.name: Veteran Trainer A
text_block_list.text: Haha, the escape and skip devil Seiun Sky, the hardworking Special Week, and the daughter of a strong household King Halo, huh.

text_block_list.name: Rookie Trainer A
text_block_list.text: They're some truly unique and interesting girls, aren't they! I'm looking forward to the Selection Race they'll be taking part in!
For a while I relaxed watching King Halo and and the others happily train together…
